item.description:
@Oblivion2 wrote:

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == ####) { if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 0) attackPlayersWithin(369, misc.random((int)(playerMaxHit / 1.5)), 1); }

Try that.

= Wep ID.

item.title: If anyone could please help, thanks!
item.dc:creator: @Spotlight Spotlight
item.description:
@Spotlight wrote:

Well i read the topic here : http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,285233.0.html

Its about making a weapon use ice barrage when you use a special. Is there a way of making the weapon use ice barrage normally, like when its attacking?

I tried my self, messing with the code and got this : if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4151)) { attackPlayersWithin(369, misc.random((int)(playerMaxHit / 1.5)), 1); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; }

But it doesnâ€™t work. If anyone knows, or can think of, the code that does this, then i will be very grateful! Thanks.

Read full topic
